author: christophe.hoche
title: Real Estate Fractional Ownership
description: Real estate is the largest asset class globally. But large quantum and low liquidity explain why access to the "property ladder" is hard.
solution: We offer fractional ownership of fully managed real estate to lower the entry amount, remove non-monetary friction and facilitate liquidity.
experience: Extensive expertise in finance and legal from over 25 years in banks and personal experience in real estate investments in different cities
